title: Avery's KPop Vocab - Section {section}
theme: The setting is the world of the Netflix hit "KPop Demon Hunters".  The following main characters should occasionally be referenced, including Rumi, Mira, Zoey, Jinu, and Baby Saja. Also, occasionally refer to the music groups Huntrix and Saja Boys.  These characters and groups do not need to referenced in every sentence. Lyrics and songs from the movie can also be used.

sections.subtitle: Marshy stages, sharp spines, and habits that help hunters thrive

entries.definition: To hold; to have within itself.
entries.sentence: This glowing crystal can ### three noisy demon spirits.

entries.definition: A jar, box, or other object used for holding something.
entries.sentence: Rumi carried a small ### filled with silver demon dust.

entries.definition: To change food that has been eaten into simpler forms that the body can use.
entries.sentence: Jinu needed time to ### all the spicy backstage noodles.
Mira is so ### about costumes; every sequin must sparkle.

entries.definition: Something that a person does so often that it is done without thinking.
entries.sentence: Zoey has a ### of humming battle songs before each show.

entries.definition: A special kind of clothing worn by certain groups.
entries.sentence: The demon hunters wore a matching ### for their secret mission.

entries.definition: A joint on a lid or door that allows it to swing open or shut.
entries.sentence: The rusty ### squeaked as the haunted door slowly opened.

entries.definition: A low-lying area, often covered with tall grasses, where the ground is soft and wet.
entries.sentence: Huntrix crossed a dark ### to reach the secret demon stage.
The ### ground squished under Zoey's boots as she ran.

entries.definition: A place where plants are grown for sale.
entries.sentence: The old plant ### sold charms made from demon-proof herbs.

entries.definition: To count on; to look to for support.
entries.sentence: Rumi knew she could ### on Zoey to keep the beat steady.
Jinu is so ###; he always fixes the sound before each show.
A chill ran down Mira's ### when she heard the demon chorus.

entries.definition: A thin, sharp, stiff part that sticks out on certain plants and animals.
entries.sentence: Each cursed rose had a glowing ### that could sting hunters.

entries.definition: To do well; to grow strong and healthy.
entries.sentence: The band will ### if they practice daily and trust each other.
